biotools.summary: The method presented here provides an approach for researchers to perform exploratory data analysis on new -omic datasets containing missing data. By removing the necessity to impute missing values, the results of the low-dimensional projections of the data are not skewed by inaccurate estimates of variance, which is often introduced by imputation.

bioschemas.name: sppPCA
